Plot: Two policemen see their personal and professional lives fall apart in the wake of the "Black Dahlia" murder investigation.
Title: The Black Dahlia
Actors: Josh Hartnett, Scarlett Johansson, Aaron Eckhart, Hilary Swank
tomatoConsensus: Though this ambitious noir crime-drama captures the atmosphere of its era, it suffers from subpar performances, a convoluted story, and the inevitable comparisons to other, more successful films of its genre.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 4 wins & 12 nominations.
